page_content:
## Jurong East/West (Near NTU)  
**HDB:**
- Common Room: $600-800/month
- Master Room: $800-1,100/month
- Whole Unit: $1,600-2,300/month  
**Condo:**
- Common Room: $900-1,300/month
- Master Room: $1,300-1,700/month
- 2-Bedroom: $2,500-3,800/month  
**Transport:**
- Jurong East MRT (East-West + North-South Line)
- Direct bus to NTU
- Free shuttle bus from Pioneer MRT to NTU  
**Advantages:**
- Most affordable near NTU
- Large shopping malls (JEM, Westgate, IMM)
- Good food options  
---

### North Region

## Woodlands / Admiralty  
**HDB:**
- Common Room: $550-750/month
- Master Room: $750-1,000/month
- Whole Unit: $1,500-2,200/month  
**Condo:**
- Common Room: $850-1,200/month
- Master Room: $1,200-1,600/month
- 2-Bedroom: $2,300-3,500/month  
**Transport:**
- Woodlands MRT (North-South Line + Thomson-East Coast Line)
- Admiralty MRT (North-South Line)
- About 45-60 minutes to city  
**Good For:**
- Very budget-conscious students
- Students studying at northern polytechnics
- Those who don't mind longer commute  
---

### East Region

## Tampines / Pasir Ris (Near SUTD/SIT)  
**HDB:**
- Common Room: $650-850/month
- Master Room: $850-1,150/month
- Whole Unit: $1,700-2,400/month  
**Condo:**
- Common Room: $950-1,350/month
- Master Room: $1,350-1,800/month
- 2-Bedroom: $2,600-3,900/month  
**Transport:**
- Tampines MRT (East-West Line + Downtown Line)
- Pasir Ris MRT (East-West Line)
- Bus to SUTD/SIT campuses  
**Advantages:**
- Large heartland area
- Excellent facilities (Tampines Mall, Century Square)
- Many food options
- Near Changi Airport

## Bedok / Tanah Merah  
**HDB:**
- Common Room: $650-850/month
- Master Room: $850-1,150/month
- Whole Unit: $1,700-2,500/month  
**Condo:**
- Common Room: $900-1,300/month
- Master Room: $1,300-1,750/month
- 2-Bedroom: $2,500-3,800/month  
**Transport:**
- Multiple MRT stations on East-West Line
- Good bus connectivity
- About 30-40 minutes to city  
---

### Central-East Region

## Paya Lebar / Macpherson  
**HDB:**
- Common Room: $800-1,100/month
- Master Room: $1,100-1,500/month
- Whole Unit: $2,000-2,800/month  
**Condo:**
- Common Room: $1,200-1,700/month
- Master Room: $1,700-2,300/month
- 2-Bedroom: $3,000-4,500/month  
**Advantages:**
- Developing area (Paya Lebar Quarter)
- Good MRT connections
- Closer to city than far east  
---
